.@HouseGOP made a commitment to fight for an economy that‚Äôs strong and a nation that‚Äôs safe.

Today‚Äôs passage of H.R. 1 will bring us a step closer to reducing energy costs for American families and reclaiming American energy independence.

American families are currently struggling through the worst energy crisis in decades.

Parents know what‚Äôs best for their children. Families in this country should be able to trust that their children are receiving a well-rounded education, not a one-sided indoctrination.

The Parents Bill of Rights ensures parents have:

- The right to know what their children are being taught.
- The right to be heard.
- The right to see the school budget and spending.
- The right to protect their children‚Äôs privacy.
- The right to keep their children safe.

Washington Democrats want to radically reshape our education system and deny parents a voice.

That‚Äôs why my colleagues on the @EdWorkforceCmte and I are advancing the Parents Bill of Rights Act.
